titleStmt.title: A true and exact copy of a prodigious and traiterous libel, affixt upon the church-door of Kettle, in Fife, the third of this instant, being Easter-day; / written and subscribed by James Russel, one of those bloody and sacrilegious murtherers of the late Lord Primate of Scotland, His Grace.
titleStmt.author: Russell, James, of Kettle.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson ...,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained, print show-through with some loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
